file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
security:
  - jwtBearer: []
info:
  title: Schul-Cloud Account Service API
  description:
    This is the API specification for the HPI Schul-Cloud Account service.
  contact:
    name: support
    email: info@hpi-schul-cloud.de
  license:
    name: GPL-3.0
    url: 'https://github.com/hpi-schul-cloud/schulcloud-server/blob/master/LICENSE'
  version: 1.0.0

components:
  securitySchemes:
    jwtBearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
  schemas:
    jwtTimer:
      type: object
      properties:
        ttl:
          type: integer

paths:
  /accounts/jwtTimer:
    get:
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/jwtTimer'
        '405':
          description: feature is disabled on this instance
      description: >-
        returns the remaining seconds the JWT is whitelisted.
      summary: get ttl of the jwt
      tags:
        - accounts
      security:
        - jwtBearer: []
    post:
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/jwtTimer'
        '405':
          description: feature is disabled on this instance
      description: >-
        resets the remaining time the JWT whitelisted, and returns the new value.
      summary: reset ttl of the jwt
      tags:
        - accounts
      security:
        - jwtBearer: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          {}
        description: no request body required

openapi: 3.0.2

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /accounts/jwtTimer: post: operation "": requestBody: content must have at least on entry
